Package com.hexaware.dao

Class VirtualArtGalleryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.VirtualArtGalleryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IvirtualArtGallery
public class VirtualArtGalleryImpl extends Object implements IvirtualArtGallery
Implementation of IVirtualArtGallery for database operations related to artwork.
